name: La tapera de Don Necochea
description:
You run out of fuel just near the entrance to an old house (how lucky you are!). It's pitch black and you start walking towards the house to ask for help.

Movements

  • WASD / cursor keys: move
  • mouse: look around
  • left mouse button: primary action on objects
  • middle mouse button: clear object descriptions from screen
  • right mouse button: look at objects
  • c: toggle crouch
  • f: toggle flashlight

What is this thing?

This is an unfinished prototype I worked on during October 2020, then "discovered it" in June 2021 and decided to cut the scope a lot and just release it in case someone finds it interesting. Don´t expect anything coherent. It's very short, around 5/10 minutes.

There's no menues, no configuration, no ending scene, you jump right into the "game".
